Body:
I have wifi modules (ESP8266), which are not in the same location. I set one of them as a server and connected to internet by using No-IP service. (It's same as a server).

Now, i want to:

  • Control devices
  • Devices monitoring
  • Save data. Controlling will be done by multiple users.

    I am a beginner and want to develop a server to do this it seems hardly with me (protocols,....).
    Eclipse IoT has many frameworks but i don't know where to start.
    Which framework could i begin with?
Want to use a esp8266 as a server?

I just do it - (make esp8266 as a server and control it), my question seems not clearly. I'm sorry about that. 	I want to know which framework could help me build back-end server to control many my devices (current only one device if using esp8266 as a server).		Now, i use **firebase DB** to control my devices. No need own back-end server anymore. Thank you.
